pkgmetadata.longdescription: Network Analysis of Metabolic Pathways and Gene Based Assemblies in Metagenomics // Functions for path based queries against 'Omics' https://github.com/etheleon/omics-neo4j-container, a 'NEO4J' https://neo4j.com/ database populated with data from metagenomic surveys and their accompanying metabolic and taxonomic annotations.
